definition: a test/determination/to check up on/to examine/to assay
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Rain and snow don't penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.chinese: 你的侦察和搜寻检定不再因雨和雪受到处罚。

sentences.english: Make an Athletics check to swim or to tread water.
sentences.chinese: 用运动检定游泳或涉水而行。

sentences.english: The measurement devices used in hydrologic monitoring shall pass the inspection according to law.
sentences.chinese: 水文监测所使用的计量器具应当依法经检定合格。

sentences.english: The calibration of thermocouples plays a very important part in its using process.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶的检定是其使用过程中必不可少的工作环节。

sentences.english: Moreover, a detailed discussion is made on the flaw due to applying separable components or elements to thermometric systems for vacuum metallurgy plant.
sentences.chinese: 详细论述了真空炉测温系统用分立元件法检定弊端。

sentences.english: Implement routines in the Metrology Lab, including identification and management of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 执行计量室的日常工作，包括测量仪器的检定及管理。

sentences.english: Fourthly, strengthen the inspection to the masters and teachers in the private school.
sentences.chinese: 加强对私立中学校长教师的检定。

sentences.english: The National Metrological Verification System shall be worked out by the metrological administrative department of the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 国家计量检定系统表由国务院计量行政部门制定。

sentences.english: To organize and conduct outside gage verification or calibration.
sentences.chinese: 负责组织和管理计量器具外部检定或校准业务。

sentences.english: This text introduced evaluation of uncertainty for the verification of little glass volume meter.
sentences.chinese: 本文对小玻璃量器检定的测量不确定度进行了评估。

sentences.english: To handle outside gage verification or calibration.
sentences.chinese: 处理计量器具外部检定或校准业务。

sentences.english: To prepare work instruction for inside verification or calibration.
sentences.chinese: 负责制定计量器具内部检定或校准作业指导书。

sentences.english: The safe situation classification of reactor is second class. The detection peroid is 6 years.
sentences.chinese: 反应器安全状况等级为二级，检定周期定为6年。

sentences.english: The problem of calibrating kingpin obliquity metrical results is resolved.
sentences.chinese: 解决了测量主销倾角量值检定的问题。

sentences.english: Congratulations to our teacher, Rita Kwan, who has recently earned the NY State teaching certificate in teaching Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本校王昭平老师近日通过纽约州中文教师检定。

sentences.english: In tests where a rein back of one horse's length is required, it should be executed with three or four steps.
sentences.chinese: 在检定中要求后退一马身时，是指三步或四步。

definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
